alternative_parents.description: Organic salt compounds containing a transition metal atom in its ionic form.
alternative_parents.name: Organic transition metal salts

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing metals and halogens. Some are ionic while others are covalently bonded.
alternative_parents.name: Organic metal halides

alternative_parents.description: Metal alkyls, where the alkyl group is attached to a transition metal atom.
alternative_parents.name: Transition metal alkyls

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a chlorine ion.
alternative_parents.name: Organic chloride salts

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Organometallic compounds containing an alkyl group attached to a mercury atom.
alternative_parents.name: Alkyl mercury compounds

class.description: Organic compounds containing a bond between a carbon atom and an oxygen atom.
class.name: Organooxygen compounds

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as dialkyl ethers. These are organic compounds containing the dialkyl ether functional group, with the formula ROR', where R and R' are alkyl groups.

direct_parent.description: Organic compounds containing the dialkyl ether functional group, with the formula ROR', where R and R' are alkyl groups.
direct_parent.name: Dialkyl ethers

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

subclass.description: Compounds bearing an ether group with the formula Compounds ROR (R not H).
subclass.name: Ethers

superclass.description: Organic compounds that contain one or more oxygen atoms.
superclass.name: Organic oxygen compounds
